title: Automated Google Business reports with GPT insights to Slack & email
description:
**Created by:** Peyton Leveillee  
**Last updated:** October 2025  

---

### üß† TL;DR  
Marketing companies charge **hundreds or even thousands per month** for automated ‚ÄúGoogle Business Pulse‚Äù reports that show visibility, reviews, and engagement trends.  
Now you can do it **for free** ‚Äî right inside **n8n**.  
This workflow pulls Google Business data, compares weekly and 12-week trends, runs it through an **LLM for insight summaries**, and sends out **Slack updates** and **weekly email reports** ‚Äî automatically.

---

### üî• Name: **Google Pulse Pro**
Your **AI marketing analyst** that runs 24/7 ‚Äî no subscription, no fluff.

---

### üß© Categories
- Business Intelligence  
- Marketing Automation  
- AI Summarization  
- Multichannel Reporting  

---

### üí¨ Overview
**Google Pulse Pro** automates weekly Google Business reporting for multiple companies or locations.  
It combines **data collection**, **trend analysis**, and **AI commentary** into a fully automated system ‚Äî delivering updates through **Slack** and **email**.  
Perfect for agencies or businesses that want client-ready, insight-driven updates without paying for SaaS dashboards.

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è Good to Know
- Uses **OpenAI Chat Models** for summarization and insights  
- Integrates **Google Business API**, **Google Sheets**, **Slack**, and **Email (Gmail or SMTP)**  
- Compares **this week vs last week** and **12-week averages**  
- Outputs **LLM-generated summaries** formatted for Slack Blocks and email templates  
- 100% no-code friendly ‚Äî ready to deploy instantly  

---

### üß† How It Works

1. **Read Companies (Google Sheets)**  
   Loads company info, Google Business IDs, Slack channels, and recipient emails.

2. **Pull Google Business Data**  
   Queries the Google Business API for **impressions, actions, CTR, and reviews** across:
   - This week  
   - Last week  
   - 12-week average  

3. **Summarize & Compare**  
   Code nodes calculate trends and append results back to Google Sheets.

4. **AI Summaries (OpenAI)**  
   Three separate LLMs generate insight lines:  
   - **Impressions one-liner** ‚Üí Visibility & engagement shifts  
   - **Reviews one-liner** ‚Üí Sentiment & reputation trends  
   - **Overall one-liner** ‚Üí Combined marketing summary  

5. **Format & Distribute**  
   All one-liners merge per company. Recipients are attached, and messages are formatted for output.  

6. **Send Reports**  
   - **Slack:** Beautifully formatted updates via Slack Blocks  
   - **Email:** Branded **Weekly Google Business Pulse** summaries  

---

### üìà Example Output

**Slack Message:**

Weekly Google Reviews & Impressions
Number 1 Auto Repair
Sept 22‚Äì28, 2025

‚Ä¢ Impressions down 41% vs last week
‚Ä¢ CTR 3pp lower than 12-week avg
‚Ä¢ 2 new reviews, 100% positive sentiment

**Email Pulse:**

![Screenshot 20251005 at 7.06.20‚ÄØPM.png](fileId:2766)




---

### üßæ Requirements
- **Google Business API credential** (OAuth2)  
- **Google Sheets credential** (OAuth2)  
- **Slack credential** (OAuth2) ‚Äî `chat:write`, `users:read`, `channels:read`  
- **Gmail or SMTP credential** (for email pulse delivery)  
- **OpenAI credential** (for summaries)

---

### ‚úèÔ∏è Customizing
- Add other KPIs (Google Ads, GA4, POS data)  
- Adjust scheduling cadence (daily, bi-weekly, monthly)  
- Send reports to Notion, Airtable, or HubSpot  
- Update Slack + email branding for your agency  

---

### üí° Use Cases
- Agencies automating client reporting  
- Multi-location businesses monitoring reputation  
- Service centers tracking performance trends  
- Anyone tired of paying for ‚ÄúGoogle Business Pulse‚Äù dashboards  

---

### üéØ Why It Matters
Most marketing firms hide behind ‚ÄúAI dashboards‚Äù to sell visibility reports.  
**Google Pulse Pro** gives you that same power ‚Äî **automated, AI-enhanced, and free**.

Unchain your reporting. Impress clients.  
And keep your marketing dollars where they belong ‚Äî **in your business.**
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.

nodeDetails.name: map and summarize last 12 weeks reviews
Map + categorize reviews (last week, single node)
